sourcesContent: import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { AlbumContainer, AlbumCover, AlbumContent, AlbumName, TracksList, Track } from './Album.style' const Album = ({ album, className }) => { return ( {album.name} {album && album.tracks.slice(0, 5).map(track => {track.song.title} )} {album.tracks.length - 5 > 0 && and {album.tracks.length - 5} other tracks } ) } export default Album
